verses.name: Romans 15:29
verses.text: And I am sure that, when I come unto you, I shall come in the fulness of the blessing of the gospel of Christ.

verses.name: Romans 15:30
verses.text: Now I beseech you, brethren, for the Lord Jesus Christ’s sake, and for the love of the Spirit, that ye strive together with me in your prayers to God for me;

verses.name: Romans 15:31
verses.text: That I may be delivered from them that do not believe in Judea; and that my service which I have for Jerusalem may be accepted of the saints;
